 20036                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20037                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20039                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20040                                  ;
 20041                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20042                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20043                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20044                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20045                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20046                                  ;
 20047                                  ;	Revision history:
 20048                                  ;
 20049                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20050                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20051                                  
 20052                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20053                                  
 20054                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20055                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20056                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20057                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20058                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20059                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20060                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20061                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20062                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20063                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20064                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20065                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20066                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20067                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20068                                  
 20069                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20070                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20071                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20072                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20073                                  ;
 20074                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20075                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20076                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20077                                  ;			terminated)
 20078                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20079                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20080                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20081                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20082                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20083                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20084                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20085                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20086                                  ;
 20087                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20088                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20089                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20090                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20091                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20092                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20093                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20094                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20095                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20096                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20097                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20098                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20099                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20100                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20101                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20102                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20103                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20104                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20105                                  
 20106                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20107                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20108                                  
 20109                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20110                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20111                                  
 20112                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20113                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20114                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20115                                  
 20116                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20117                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20118                                  
 20119 00003011 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20120                                  
 20121                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20122                                  ;
 20123                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20124                                  
 20125                                  Create_inter:
 20126 00003013 A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20127                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20128 00003015 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20129 00003017 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20130 00003019 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20131                                  	
 20132                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20133                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20134 0000301B 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20135                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20136                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20137                                  	
 20138 00003020 B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20139                                  NoReset:
 20140 00003022 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20141 00003024 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20142 00003026 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20143                                  AttErr:
 20144 00003028 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20145                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20146                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20147 0000302B E8A0E2                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20148 0000302E EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20149                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20150                                  ATT_OK:
 20151 00003030 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20152 00003034 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20153 00003035 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20154 00003039 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20155 0000303C 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20156                                  
 20157                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20158                                  
 20159 0000303E 07                      	POP	ES
 20160                                  
 20161                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20162                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20163                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20164 0000303F F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20165 00003044 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20166                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20167 00003046 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20168                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20169 00003047 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20170                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20171 0000304A CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20172 0000304C 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20173 0000304D C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 20174 00003052 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 20175                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 20176                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20177                                  
 20178                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20179                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 20180                                  ;ELSE
 20181 00003053 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20182                                  
 20183                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 20184                                  	;INT	2FH
 20185                                  
 20186 00003054 B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 20187                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20188                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 20189                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20190                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 20191                                  			; STACK: WORD file creation mode???
 20192                                  
 20193                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20194                                  	;retn
 20195 00003057 EBF1                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20196                                  ;ENDIF
 20197                                  
 20198                                  ;	We have a CDS. See if it's network
 20199                                  
 20200                                  TEST_RE_NET:
 20201                                  	;;test	word [es:si+43h],8000h
 20202                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20203                                  	; 07/12/2022
 20204                                  	;test	byte [es:si+44h],80h
 20205                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20206 00003059 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20207 0000305E 07                      	POP	ES
 20208 0000305F 7417                    	JZ	short LOCAL_CREATE
 20209                                  
 20210                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20211 00003061 E8C700                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode		    ;AN000;EO.
 20212 00003064 7205                    	JC	SHORT dochk		    ;AN000;EO.
 20213                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20214                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20215                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20216 00003066 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20217                                  
 20218                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20219                                  dochk:
 20220 0000306B F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20221 00003070 75D4                    	JNZ	short IFS_extopen	    ;AN000;EO. yes, issue extended open
 20222                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20223                                  
 20224                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20225                                  ;	transfer NET_CREATE
 20226                                  ;ELSE
 20227 00003072 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20228                                  	
 20229                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 23
 20230                                  	;INT	2FH
 20231                                  	
 20232 00003073 B81711                  	mov     ax,1117h
 20233                                  	
 20234                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20235                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE REMOTE FILE
 20236                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20237                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20238                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20239                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20240                                  
 20241                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20242                                  ;nomore:
 20243                                  	;retn
 20244 00003076 EBD2                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20245                                  ;ENDIF
 20246                                  
 20247                                  ;**	It's a local create. We have a local CDS for it.
 20248                                  
 20249                                  LOCAL_CREATE:
 20250                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20251 00003078 E8B000                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode	;AN000;EO. set mode if from extended open
 20252 0000307B 7205                    	JC	short setdone	;AN000;EO.
 20253                                  	
 20254                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20255                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20256                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20257                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20258                                  	;or	byte [es:di+2],2
 20259 0000307D 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20260                                  setdone:
 20261 00003082 E813E8                  	call	ECritDisk
 20262 00003085 E84F20                  	call	MakeNode
 20263 00003088 7317                    	JNC	short Create_ok
 20264 0000308A C606[A10A]FF            	mov	byte [VOLCHNG_FLAG],-1	; indicate no change in volume label
 20265 0000308F E833E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20266                                  
 20267                                  	;entry	SET_MKND_ERR
 20268                                  SET_MKND_ERR:
 20269                                  
 20270                                  ;	Looks up MakeNode errors and converts them. AL is MakeNode
 20271                                  ;	error, SI is GETPATH bad spot return if path_not_found error.
 20272                                  
 20273                                  ;hkn; CRTERRTAB is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE)
 20274 00003092 BB[9930]                	MOV     BX,CRTERRTAB
 20275                                  	;XLAT  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20276                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20277 00003095 2E                      	CS
 20278 00003096 D7                      	XLAT
 20279                                  CreatBadRet:
 20280 00003097 F9                      	STC
 20281 00003098 C3                      	retn
 20282                                  
 20283                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20284                                  ; DOSCODE:69C4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20286                                  
 20287                                  ;** Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20288                                  
 20289                                  ; 17/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20290                                  ; Offset 12B1h of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 20291                                  
 20292                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 19/07/2018 - MSDOS 3.3	
 20293                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h
 20294                                  
 20295                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 18/05/2019 - MSDOS 6.0	
 20296                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h,2
 20297                                  
 20298                                  ; 08/08/2018
 20299                                  
 20300                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 20301 00003099 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20302 0000309A 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20303 0000309B 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20304 0000309C 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20305 0000309D 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 20306 0000309E 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 20307 0000309F 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 20308                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20309 000030A0 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7
 20310                                  
 20311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20312                                  
 20313                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 20314                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20315                                  ; file to the current size.
 20316                                  
 20317                                  ; If we created a volume id on the diskette, set the VOLCHNG_FLAG to logical
 20318                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.
 20319                                  
 20320                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20321                                  Create_ok:
 20322                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20323                                  	;call	FastOpen_Delete
 20324                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20325 000030A1 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 20326 000030A4 A808                    	test	al,attr_volume_id
 20327 000030A6 741C                    	jz	short NoVolLabel
 20328 000030A8 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 20329                                  	;mov	ah,[ES:DI+curdir.text]	; get drive letter
 20330 000030AC 268A25                  	mov	ah,[ES:DI] ; 09/08/2018
 20331 000030AF 80EC41                  	sub	ah,'A'	; 41h		; convert to drive number
 20332 000030B2 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],ah	;Set flag to indicate volid change
 20333                                  	
 20334                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20335                                  
 20336                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20337 000030B6 B701                    	MOV	BH,1			;AN000;>32mb set volume id to boot record
 20338 000030B8 E81F00                  	CALL	Set_Media_ID		;AN000;>32mb
 20339                                  	
 20340 000030BB E8DAE7                  	call	ECritDisk
 20341 000030BE E8EA30                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; force a media check
 20342 000030C1 E801E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20343                                  
 20344                                  NoVolLabel:
 20345 000030C4 B80200                  	MOV	ax,2
 20346 000030C7 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20347                                  ;if installed
 20348                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20349 000030CB FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)] ; 14 = ShSU
 20350                                  ;else
 20351                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 20352                                  ;endif
 20353 000030CF E8F3E7                  	call	LCritDisk
 20354 000030D2 E94501                  	jmp	SET_SFT_MODE
 20355                                  
 20356                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20357                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20358                                  ;
 20359                                  ; Inputs:
 20360                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20361                                  ;		terminated)
 20362                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20363                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20364                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20365                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20366                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20367                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20368                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20369                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20370                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20371                                  ; Function:
 20372                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20373                                  ; Outputs:
 20374                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20375                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20376                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20377                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20378                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20379                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20380                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20381                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20382                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20383                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20384                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20385                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20386                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20387                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20388                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20389                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20390                                  
 20391                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20392 000030D5 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20393 000030D7 E939FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 20394                                  
 20395                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20396                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20397                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 20398                                  ;
 20399                                  ; Inputs:
 20400                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 20401                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 20402                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 20403                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 20404                                  ; Function:
 20405                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 20406                                  ; Outputs:
 20407                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20408                                  ;	    volume id set
 20409                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20410                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20412                                  
 20413                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20414                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20415                                  Set_Media_ID:
 20416 000030DA 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20417 000030DB 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20418 000030DC 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 20419                                  
 20420 000030DD FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 20421 000030DF 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 20422 000030E1 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 20423                                  	;MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 20424                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20425                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20426 000030E3 B96648                  	mov	cx,4866h	; ch = FAT32 disk drive (CATEGORY CODE)
 20427                                  				; cl = minor code,
 20428                                  				;      get volume serial number (and name)
 20429                                  
 20430                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 20431 000030E6 BA[A00D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 20432                                  
 20433                                  Set_Media_ID_1:
 20434                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20435 000030E9 51                      	push	cx
 20436                                  
 20437 000030EA 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20438 000030EB 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20439 000030EC 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20440                                  
 20441                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 20442 000030EE E849F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20443                                  
 20444 000030F1 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20445 000030F2 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20446                                  
 20447                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20448 000030F3 59                      	pop	cx
 20449                                  	;JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 20450 000030F4 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2
 20451 000030F6 80FD48                  	cmp	ch,48h		; is it FAT32 disk drive request?
 20452 000030F9 F9                      	stc
 20453 000030FA 7529                    	jne	short geterr	; (ch=8 request failed!)
 20454 000030FC B508                    	mov	ch,8		; set category code for (old) FAT disk drive
 20455                                  				; (except FAT32)
 20456 000030FE EBE9                    	jmp     short Set_Media_ID_1 ; and try again
 20457                                  
 20458                                  Set_Media_ID_2:
 20459 00003100 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id
 20460 00003102 7405                    	JZ	short NoName	;AN000;>32mb yes
 20461

 20470                                  
 20471                                  doset:				;AN000;
 20472 0000310C 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20473                                  	;add	di,6
 20474 0000310E 83C706                  	ADD	DI,MEDIA_ID_INFO.MEDIA_Label ;AN000;;>32mb
 20475                                  
 20476                                  ;hkn; ES & DS must point to SS
 20477                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 20478 00003111 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 20479                                  
 20480 00003112 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20481                                  
 20482                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20483 00003113 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20484

 20486

 20488 00003115 51                      	push	cx
 20489

 20491 00003119 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB		;AN000;;>32mb

 20501 00003122 E815F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20502                                  geterr: 			;AN000;

 20510 00003129 58                      	POP	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20511 0000312A C3                      	retn			;AN000;>32mb
 20512

 20520                                  ; Function:

 20545                                  ;============================================================================
 20546                                  ; OPEN.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20547                                  ;============================================================================
 20548                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20549                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20550                                  
 20551                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20552                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20553                                  
 20554                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20556                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20557                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20558                                  ;
 20559                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20560                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20561                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20562                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20563                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20564                                  ;
 20565                                  ;	Revision history:
 20566                                  ;
 20567                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20568                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20569                                  ;
 20570                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20571                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20572                                  ;
 20573                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20574                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20575                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20576                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20577                                  ;	       else do not.
 20578                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20579                                  
 20580                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20581                                  
 20582                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20583                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20584                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20585                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20586                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20587                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20588                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20589                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20590                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20591                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20592                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20593                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20594                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20595                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20596                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20597                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20598                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20599                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20600                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20601                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20602                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20603                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20604                                  ;
 20605                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20606                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20607                                  
 20608                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20609                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20610                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20611                                  ;
 20612                                  ; Inputs:
 20613                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20614                                  ;		terminated)
 20615                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20616                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20617                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20618                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20619                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20620                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20621                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20622                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20623                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20624                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20625                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20626                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20627                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20628                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20629                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20630                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20631                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20632                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20633                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20634                                  ;
 20635                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20636                                  ;		(not checked)
 20637                                  ; Function:
 20638                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20639                                  ; Outputs:
 20640                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20641                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20642                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20643                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20644                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20645                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20646                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20647                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20648                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20649                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20650                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20651                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 20652                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 20653                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20654                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 20655                                  ;			open a directory
 20656                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20657                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20658                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 20659                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20661                                  
 20662                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20663                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20664                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20665                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20666                                  
 20667                                  ; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20668                                  ; DOSCODE:71BBh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20669                                  
 20670                                  DOS_OPEN:
 20671                                  	; DS has been set up to DOSDATA in file.asm and fcbio2.asm. 
 20672                                  
 20673 0000313F C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 20674 00003144 E82201                  	CALL	Check_Access_AX
 20675 00003147 722B                    	JC	short do_ret_label	    ; retc
 20676                                  
 20677 00003149 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20678 0000314D 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 20679                                  
 20680                                  	; sleaze! move only access/sharing mode in. Leave sf_isFCB unchanged
 20681                                  
 20682 0000314F 26884502                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AL ; For moment do this on FCBs too
 20683 00003153 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20684 00003154 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20685                                  	; 18/08/2018
 20686 00003158 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 20687 0000315B 7530                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET1
 20688 0000315D 07                      	POP	ES
 20689                                  
 20690                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20691                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20692 0000315E F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 20693 00003163 7410                    	JZ	short _NOEXTOP 		    ;FT. no, do normal			;AN000;
 20694                                  _IFS_extopen:									;AN000;
 20695 00003165 A0[0106]                	MOV	AL,[SAVE_BX]		    ; M034 - save_bx has original bx  
 20696                                  					    ; with which call was made. This
 20697                                  					    ; has the open access bits. 
 20698                                  	;;MOV	AL,[SAVE_CX]		    ; M034 - FT. al= create attribute
 20699                                  	
 20700 00003168 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;FT. pass create attr to IFS	;AN000;
 20701                                  	;mov	ax,112Eh
 20702                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;FT. issue extended open verb	;AN000;
 20703 00003169 B82E11                  	mov	ax,(MultNET*256)+46 
 20704 0000316C CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20705 0000316E 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;FT. trash bx			;AN000;
 20706 0000316F C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20707                                  
 20708                                  do_ret_label:
 20709 00003174 C3                      	retn				    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20710                                  _NOEXTOP:
 20711                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20712                                  	;
 20713                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20714                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 20715                                  ;ELSE
 20716                                  	
 20717                                  do_net_int2f:
 20718 00003175 F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 20719 0000317A 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20720                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 20721                                  					;    of this 
 20722                                  	
 20723                                  					; M042 - start
 20724                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h
 20725 0000317C F606[1206]08            	test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(EXEC_AWARE_REDIR>>8)
 20726                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 20727                                  					;    this
 20728 00003181 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20729                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 20730                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 20731                                  					; M042 - end
 20732                                  	
 20733                                  	; NOTE: This specific mode has not been set for the code assembled
 20734                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 20735                                  	; always one.
 20736                                  					; M035 - set the bits on the stack
 20737                                  	;mov	al,23h
 20738 00003183 B023                    	mov	AL,SHARING_DENY_WRITE+EXEC_OPEN
 20739                                  	
 20740                                  not_exec_open:
 20741                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20742 00003185 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20743                                  
 20744                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 22
 20745                                  	;INT	2FH
 20746                                  
 20747 00003186 B81611                  	mov     ax,1116h
 20748 00003189 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 20749                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20750                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20751                                  			; STACK: WORD file open mode
 20752                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20753                                  
 20754 0000318B 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 20755                                  ;do_ret_label: ; 09/08/2018
 20756 0000318C C3                      	retn
 20757                                  ;ENDIF
 20758                                  
 20759                                  TEST_RE_NET1:
 20760                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20761                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20762 0000318D 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20763 00003192 07                      	POP	ES
 20764                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20765 00003193 7409                    	JZ	short LOCAL_OPEN
 20766                                  
 20767                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20768                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20769 00003195 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open	;AN000;
 20770 0000319A 75C9                    	JNZ	short _IFS_extopen	      ;FT. issue extended open	;AN000;
 20771                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20772                                  
 20773                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20774                                  ;	transfer NET_OPEN
 20775                                  ;ELSE
 20776 0000319C EBD7                    	jmp	short do_net_int2f
 20777                                  ;ENDIF
 20778                                  
 20779                                  LOCAL_OPEN:
 20780                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20781 0000319E E8F7E6                  	call	ECritDisk
 20782                                  
 20783                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20784                                  
 20785                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20786                                  	;;or	byte [FastOpenFlg],5
 20787                                  	;OR	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set+Special_Fill_Set ; only open can
 20788                                  
 20789 000031A1 E8D417                  	call	GETPATH
 20790                                  
 20791                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20792                                  
 20793 000031A4 7317                    	JNC	short Open_found
 20794 000031A6 750B                    	JNZ	short bad_path2
 20795 000031A8 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 20796 000031AA 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path2
 20797                                  OpenFNF:
 20798 000031AC B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found	; 2
 20799                                  OpenBadRet:
 20800                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA use SS override
 20801                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20802                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FastOpenFlg],0 ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) offset 36CAh
 20803                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20804                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20805                                  	;AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes    ;; DOS 3.3
 20806                                  	
 20807 000031AF F9                      	STC
 20808                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20809                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20810 000031B0 E912E7                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20811                                  
 20812                                  bad_path2:
 20813 000031B3 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found	; 3
 20814 000031B6 EBF7                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20815                                  
 20816                                  Open_Bad_Access:
 20817 000031B8 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; 5
 20818 000031BB EBF2                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20819                                  
 20820                                  Open_found:
 20821 000031BD 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 20822 000031BF 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 20823 000031C1 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 20824 000031C3 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 20825                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 20826 000031C7 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 20827 000031CB A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 20828 000031CD 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 20829 000031CF A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 20830 000031D1 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 20831                                  
 20832                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 20833                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 20834                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 20835                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 20836                                  ;
 20837                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20838                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20839                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 20840                                  
 20841 000031D3 1E                      	push	ds
 20842 000031D4 56                      	push	si
 20843 000031D5 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 20844                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 20845 000031D9 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 20846                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20847                                  	;test	ch,80h
 20848 000031DC F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 20849                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 20850 000031DF 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 20851 000031E1 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 20852 000031E3 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 20853 000031E6 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 20854 000031E9 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 20855                                  ResetAccess:
 20856                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 20857                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 20858                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20859                                  	;and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 20860                                  	;;;
 20861                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20862                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20863                                  	;and	cx,0FFFCh
 20864 000031EB 80E1FC                  	and	cl,0FCh ; ~3 ; ~open_mode_mask ; clear access
 20865                                  	;;;
 20866                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 20867 000031EE 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 20868 000031F1 EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 20869                                  
 20870                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 20871                                  
 20872                                  NormalOpen:
 20873                                  	;AND	CL,access_mask	; 0Fh	; remove extras
 20874                                  	;;;
 20875                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20876                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20877 000031F3 80E103                  	and     cl,3		; it was 'and cl,0Fh' in MSDOS 6.22
 20878                                  				; (and cl,access_mask)
 20879                                  				; this may be open_mode_mask
 20880                                  	;;;
 20881 000031F6 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 20882 000031F9 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT	; yes
 20883 000031FB 5E                      	pop	si
 20884 000031FC 1F                      	pop	ds
 20885 000031FD EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 20886                                  ;
 20887                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 20888                                  ;
 20889                                  FillSFT:
 20890 000031FF 5E                      	pop	si
 20891 00003200 1F                      	pop	ds
 20892                                  open_ok:
 20893 00003201 E87B20                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 20894                                  
 20895                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 20896                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20897                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 20898                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20899                                  	;AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 20900                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20901                                  	;and	byte [FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	
 20902                                  
 20903                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20904 00003204 E84300                  	CALL	DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20905 00003207 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK
 20906                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20907                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20908 00003209 E9B9E6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20909                                  
 20910                                  SHARE_OK:
 20911                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20912 0000320C B80300                  	MOV	AX,3
 20913 0000320F C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20914                                  ;if installed
 20915                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4

 20959                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 20960                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 20961                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved

 20985                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20987                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20988                                  ;
 20989                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 20990                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 20991                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 20992                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok

 20996                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:

 20998                                  OPN_RETRY:
 20999 0000324D 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21000                                  OpenShareRetry:
 21001 00003251 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21002 00003252 E8214E                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21003 00003255 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21004 00003256 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 21005 00003258 E87AE5                  	call	Idle
 21006 0000325B E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 21007                                  OpenShareFail:

 21017                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21018                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 21019                                  ;
 21020                                  ; Inputs:
 21021                                  ;	AX is mode
 21022                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 21023                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 21024                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 21025                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 21026                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 21027                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 21028                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 21029                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 21030                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 21031                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 21032                                  ; Function:
 21033                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 21034                                  ; Outputs:
 21035                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 21036                                  ;	Carry Clear
 21037                                  ;		Mode is correct
 21038                                  ;		AX unchanged
 21039                                  ;	Carry Set
 21040                                  ;		Mode is bad
 21041                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 21042                                  ; No other registers effected
 21043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21044                                  
 21045                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21046                                  Check_Access_AX:
 21047 00003269 A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 21048 0000326C 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21049                                  
 21050                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 21051                                  
 21052 0000326D 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21053 0000326F 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 21054                                  
 21055                                  	;CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 21056                                  	;JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21057                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21058                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21059 00003272 803E[7205]00            	cmp	byte [FSHARING],0
 21060 00003277 7405                    	jz	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21061                                  
 21062 00003279 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h
 21063 0000327C 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 21064                                  CheckShareMode:
 21065 0000327E 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 21066 00003281 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21067                                  CheckAccessMode:
 21068 00003283 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21069                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21070 00003285 80E303                  	and	bl,3 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM	
 21071                                  	;AND	BL,access_mask ; 0Fh
 21072 00003288 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 21073 0000328B 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21074 0000328D 5B                      	POP	BX
 21075 0000328E F8                      	CLC
 21076 0000328F C3                      	retn
 21077                                  
 21078                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 21079 00003290 B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 21080 00003293 5B                      	POP	BX
 21081 00003294 F9                      	STC
 21082 00003295 C3                      	retn

 21084                                  ;============================================================================
 21085                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21086                                  ;============================================================================
 21087                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 21089                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21090                                  
 21091                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 21092                                  ;	  or NET device
 21093                                  ;
 21094                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 21095                                  ;
 21096                                  ;	  Modification history:
 21097                                  ;
 21098                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21099                                  
 21100                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 21101                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21102                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 21103                                  ;
 21104                                  ; Inputs:
 21105                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 21106                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 21107                                  ; Function:
 21108                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 21109                                  ; Returns:
 21110                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 21111                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 21112                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 21113                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 21114                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 21115                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 21116                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 21117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21118                                  
 21119                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to
 21120                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 21121                                  
 21122                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21123                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:732Bh
 21124                                  
 21125                                  DISK_INFO:
 21126                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21127                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 21128                                  
 21129 00003296 E881E5                  	call	TestNet
 21130 00003299 7318                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 21131                                  
 21132                                  	;;;
 21133                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21134 0000329B 31F6                    	xor     si,si	; free cluster count hw = 0
 21135 0000329D 31FF                    	xor     di,di	; number of clusters hw = 0
 21136                                  	;;;
 21137                                  
 21138                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21139                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 21140                                  ;ELSE
 21141                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 21142                                  	;INT	2FH
 21143                                  	;return
 21144                                  
 21145 0000329F B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 21146 000032A2 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 21147                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 21148                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 21149                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 21150                                  	;;;
 21151                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21152 000032A4 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh
 21153 000032A7 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_1
 21154 000032A9 89DF                    	mov	di,bx
 21155                                  dsk_info_1:
 21156 000032AB 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh
 21157 000032AE 7502                    	jne	short disk_info_retn
 21158 000032B0 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 21159                                  disk_info_retn:
 21160                                  	;;;
 21161 000032B2 C3                      	retn
 21162                                  ;ENDIF
 21163                                  
 21164                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 21165                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk

 21175 000032BE 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21176 000032C0 A3[E80A]                	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],ax ; 0	; clear high word of cluster number
 21177                                  	;;;

 21179 000032C6 E8682C                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 21180                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21181                                  	;;;
 21182                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0

 21184                                  dsk_info_2:
 21185                                  	;jmp	CRIT_LEAVE
 21186 000032CB E9F7E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21187                                  dsk_info_3:
 21188                                  	;;;
 21189 000032CE C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 21190                                  	; 02/02/2024
 21191                                  	;;mov	ah,[si+20]
 21192                                  	;mov	ah,[si+24] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21193 000032D2 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 21194                                  
 21195                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 21196 000032D5 16                      	push	ss
 21197 000032D6 1F                      	pop	ds
 21198                                  
 21199                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21200                                  %if 0
 21201                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21202                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21203                                  
 21204                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 21205                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 21206                                  
 21207                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21208                                  	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 21209                                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 21210                                  	JZ	short DoScan
 21211                                  
 21212                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 21213                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 21214                                  ; the count.
 21215                                  
 21216                                  	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 21217                                  	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 21218                                  DoScan:
 21219                                  	XOR	DX,DX
 21220                                  	DEC	CX
 21221                                  SCANFREE:
 21222                                  	call	UNPACK
 21223                                  	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21224                                  	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 21225                                  	INC	DX			; A free one
 21226                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21227                                  	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 21228                                  	LOOP	SCANFREE
 21229                                  	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 21230                                  ReturnVals:
 21231                                  	DEC	BX			; count
 21232                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21233                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 21234                                  	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 21235                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21236                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 21237                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 21238                                  	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 21239                                  	CLC
 21240                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21241                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21242                                  	;retn
 21243                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21244                                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21245                                  
 21246                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 21247                                  ; return.
 21248                                  
 21249                                  GotVal: 
 21250                                  	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 21251                                  	JMP	short ReturnVals
 21252                                  
 21253                                  %else
 21254                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21255 000032D7 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21256 000032D9 89F7                    	mov	di,si	; 0
 21257                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21258 000032DB 268B561F                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]	; get free count
 21259                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],si
 21260 000032DF 2639760F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],si ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21261 000032E3 7406                    	jz	short dsk_info_4	; yes
 21262                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21263 000032E5 268B4E0D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21264 000032E9 EB18                    	jmp	short dsk_info_5 ; zf=0, si=di=0
 21265                                  
 21266                                  dsk_info_4:
 21267                                  	;mov	di,[es:bp+2Fh]
 21268 000032EB 268B7E2F                	mov	di,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 21269                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 21270 000032EF 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 21271                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+21h]
 21272 000032F3 268B7621                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW] ; hw of free cluster count
 21273 000032F7 39F2                    	cmp	dx,si			; same (zero) ?
 21274                                  ;dsk_info_5:
 21275 000032F9 7504                    	jnz	short dsk_info_6	; not same (not zero)
 21276 000032FB 42                      	inc	dx
 21277 000032FC 740B                    	jz	short dsk_info_8	; 0FFFFh -> 0 (free count is invalid/initial)
 21278                                  					; free count calculation is needed
 21279 000032FE 4A                      	dec	dx
 21280                                  dsk_info_6:
 21281 000032FF 39FE                    	cmp	si,di			; same hw ?
 21282 00003301 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_7	; no
 21283                                  dsk_info_5:	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 21284 00003303 39CA                    	cmp	dx,cx			; same lw ?
 21285                                  dsk_info_7:
 21286 00003305 7268                    	jb	short GotVal		; free cluster count < last cluster number
 21287 00003307 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; 0
 21288                                  dsk_info_8:
 21289 00003309 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21290 0000330B 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; last cluster number - 1 = number of clusters
 21291 0000330E 19F7                    	sbb	di,si
 21292                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 21293 00003310 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1 ; set first access bit 0
 21294                                  					; (Update flag for FSINFO sector)
 21295                                  SCANFREE:
 21296 00003315 56                      	push	si
 21297 00003316 FF36[EC0A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21298 0000331A 57                      	push	di
 21299 0000331B E8132C                  	call	UNPACK
 21300 0000331E 5F                      	pop	di
 21301 0000331F 8F06[EC0A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21302 00003323 5E                      	pop	si
 21303 00003324 7246                    	jc	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21304 00003326 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21305 00003328 42                      	inc	dx			; a free one
 21306 00003329 7501                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21307 0000332B 46                      	inc	si			; increase hw of free cluster count
 21308                                  
 21309                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21310 0000332C 43                      	inc	bx			; next cluster
 21311 0000332D 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS2
 21312 0000332F FF06[E80A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]	; increase hw of (next) cluster number
 21313                                  
 21314                                  NOTFREECLUS2:
 21315 00003333 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; decrease remain cluster count for calculation
 21316 00003336 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0
 21317 00003339 75DA                    	jnz	short SCANFREE

 21319 0000333D EBD6                    	jmp	short SCANFREE
 21320                                  
 21321                                  NOTFREECLUS3:
 21322 0000333F 8B3E[E80A]              	mov	di,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 21323 00003343 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21324 00003346 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0			; di:bx = last cluster number
 21325                                  
 21326                                  ReturnVals:

 21328 0000334B 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21329 0000334E 19CF                    	sbb	di,cx			; di:bx = number of clusters
 21330                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]

 21343                                  ReturnVals2:

 21346 0000336B F8                      	clc
 21347                                  
 21348                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21349                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21350                                  	;retn
