 29485                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29486                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29487                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29488                                  ;
 29489                                  ; Inputs:
 29490                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 29491                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29492                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29493                                  ; Function:
 29494                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29495                                  ; Outputs:

 29760                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29761                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29762                                  ;
 29763                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29764                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29765                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29766                                  ;
 29767                                  ;	[path]device
 29768                                  ;
 29769                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29770                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29771                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29772                                  ;
 29773                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29774                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29775                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29776                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29777                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29778                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29779                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29781                                  
 29782                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29783 00004CFE 57                      	push	di
 29784 00004CFF 56                      	push	si
 29785 00004D00 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29786                                  
 29787                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29788                                  
 29789 00004D02 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29790 00004D04 E8330D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29791 00004D07 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29792 00004D09 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29793                                  
 29794                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29795                                  
 29796 00004D0A AD                      	LODSW
 29797 00004D0B 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29798 00004D0E 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29799                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29800 00004D11 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29801 00004D13 AC                      	LODSB
 29802 00004D14 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29803 00004D16 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29804 00004D18 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29805 00004D1A AC                      	LODSB
 29806 00004D1B E81C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29807 00004D1E 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29808                                  
 29809                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29810                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29811                                  
 29812                                  ParseDev:
 29813 00004D20 1E                      	push	ds
 29814 00004D21 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29815 00004D22 E8590C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29816 00004D25 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29817 00004D28 F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29818 00004D29 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29819                                  
 29820                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29821 00004D2B 16                      	push	ss
 29822 00004D2C 1F                      	pop	ds
 29823                                  
 29824                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29825                                  ;
 29826                                  ; SR;
 29827                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29828                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29829                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29830                                  
 29831 00004D2D A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29832 00004D30 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29833                                  
 29834                                  ; M026 - end
 29835                                  
 29836 00004D33 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29837                                  
 29838                                  SkipSearch:
 29839 00004D36 5E                      	pop	si
 29840 00004D37 1F                      	pop	ds
 29841                                  
 29842                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29843                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29844                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29845                                  
 29846                                  CheckReturn:
 29847 00004D38 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29848 00004D39 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29849 00004D3B 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29850                                  Check_Done:
 29851 00004D3D 5F                      	pop	di
 29852 00004D3E F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29853 00004D3F C3                      	retn
 29854                                  NotDevice:
 29855 00004D40 F9                      	STC
 29856 00004D41 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 29908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29909                                  ;
 29910                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29911                                  ;
 29912                                  ; Inputs:
 29913                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29914                                  ;	AH is function code
 29915                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29916                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29917                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29918                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29919                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29920                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29921                                  ;				   present.
 29922                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29923                                  ; Function:
 29924                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29925                                  ; Outputs:
 29926                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29927                                  ;	If a status call
 29928                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29929                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29930                                  ; For regular files:
 29931                                  ;	Input Status
 29932                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29933                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29934                                  ;	Input
 29935                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29936                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29937                                  ;	Output Status
 29938                                  ;		Always ready
 29939                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved

 30619                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30620                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 30622                                  
 30623                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30624                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30625                                  ;
 30626                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30627                                  ;
 30628                                  ; Inputs:
 30629                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30630                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30631                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30632                                  ; Function:
 30633                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30634                                  ; Output:
 30635                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30636                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30637                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30638                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30639                                  ;
 30640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30641                                  
 30642                                  RW_SC:
 30643                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30644                                  	
 30645                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30646                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30647                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30648                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30649                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30650                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30651                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30652                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30653                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30654                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30655                                  
 30656                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30657                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30658                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30659                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30660                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30661                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30662                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30663                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30664                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30665                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30666                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30667                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30668                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30669                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30670                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30671                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30672                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30673                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30674                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30675                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30676                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30677                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30678                                  chklow: 						
 30679                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30680                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30681                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30682                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30683                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30684                                  readsr:
 30685                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30686                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30687                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30688                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30689                                  
 30690                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30691                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30692                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30693                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30694                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30695                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30696                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30697                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30698                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30699                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30700                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30701                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30702                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30703                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30704                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30705                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30706                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30707                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30708                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30709                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30710                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30711                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30712                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30713                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30714                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30715                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30716                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30717                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30718                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.

 30720                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30721                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30722                                  ;
 30723                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30724                                  ;
 30725                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30726                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30727                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30728                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30729                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30730                                  ; Function:
 30731                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30732                                  ; Output:
 30733                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30734                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30735                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30736                                  ;
 30737                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30738                                  
 30739                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30740                                  IN_SC:
 30741                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30742                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30743                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30744                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30745                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30746                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30747                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30748                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30749                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30750                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30751                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30752                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30753                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30754                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30755                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30756                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30757                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30758                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30759                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30760                                  
 30761                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30762                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30763                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30764                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30766                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30767                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30768                                  ;
 30769                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30770                                  ;
 30771                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30772                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30773                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30774                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30775                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30776                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30777                                  ;
 30778                                  ; Function:
 30779                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30780                                  ; Output:
 30781                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30782                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30783                                  
 30784                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30785                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30786                                  
 30787                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30788                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30789                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30790                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30791                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30792                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30793                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30794                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30795                                  
 30796                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30797                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30798                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30799                                  
 30800                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30801                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30802                                  ;
 30803                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30804                                  ;
 30805                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30806                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30807                                  ; Function:
 30808                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30809                                  ; Output:
 30810                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30811                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30812                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30813                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30814                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30815                                  ;     
 30816                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30817                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30818                                  
 30819                                  VIRREAD:
 30820                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30821                                  
 30822                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30823                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30824                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30825                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30826                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30827                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30828                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30829                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30830                                  
 30831                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30832                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30833                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30834                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30835                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30836                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30837                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30838                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30839                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30840                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30841                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30842                                  	POP	CX
 30843                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30844                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30845                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30846                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30847                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30848                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30849                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30850                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30851                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30852                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30853                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30854                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30855                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30856                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30857                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30858                                  
 30859                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30860                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30861                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30862                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30863                                  
 30864                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30866                                  ;
 30867                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30868                                  ;
 30869                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30870                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30871                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30872                                  ; Function:
 30873                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30874                                  ; Output:
 30875                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30876                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30877                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30878                                  
 30879                                  SC2BUF:
 30880                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30881                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30882                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30883                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30884                                  	jc	short sexit
 30885                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30886                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30887                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30888                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30889                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30890                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30891                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30892                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30893                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30894                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30895                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30896                                  	mul	cx
 30897                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30898                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30899                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30900                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30901                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30902                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30903                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30904                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30905                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30906                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30907                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30908                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30909                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30910                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30911                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30912                                  nodd:
 30913                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30914                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30915                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30916                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30917                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30918                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30919                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30920                                  
 30921                                  %endif	; SC

 30953                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30954                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30955                                  ;
 30956                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30957                                  ;
 30958                                  ; Inputs:
 30959                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30960                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30961                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30962                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30963                                  ;               entries
 30964                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30965                                  ; Function:
 30966                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30967                                  ; Outputs:
 30968                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30969                                  ;       ELSE
 30970                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30971                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30972                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30973                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30974                                  ;
 30975                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31142                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4

 31203                                  ;
 31204                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31205                                  ;
 31206                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31207                                  ;
 31208                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31209                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31210                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31211                                  ;
 31212                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31213                                  
 31214                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31215                                  
 31216                                  SETDOTENT:
 31217                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31218 000050B0 AB                      	STOSW
 31219 000050B1 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31220 000050B4 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31221 000050B7 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31222 000050B9 AA                      	STOSB
 31223

 31225                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31226 000050BA B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31227 000050BC AA                      	STOSB
 31228                                  
 31229                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31230                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31231                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31232                                  	;;;
 31233 000050BD 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31234 000050C0 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31235 000050C3 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31236                                  	;;;	
 31237 000050C4 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31238                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]

 31240 000050CB AB                      	STOSW

 31242 000050CC 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31243 000050CF AB                      	STOSW
 31244

 31246 000050D0 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31247 000050D2 AB                      	STOSW
 31248

 31253 000050D5 AB                      	STOSW

 31256                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31257                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31258                                  ;
 31259                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31260                                  ;
 31261                                  ; Inputs:
 31262                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31263                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31264                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31265                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31266                                  ;
 31267                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31268                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31269                                  ;
 31270                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31271                                  ;               terminated)
 31272                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31273                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31274                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31275                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31276                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31277                                  ; Function:
 31278                                  ;       Make a new node
 31279                                  ; Outputs:
 31280                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31281                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31282                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31283                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31284                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31285                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31286                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31287                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31288                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31289                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31290                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31291                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31292                                  ;       ELSE
 31293                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31294                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31295                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31296                                  ;               containing new node.
 31297                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31298                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31299                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31300                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31301                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31302                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31303                                  ;
 31304                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31305                                  
 31306                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31307                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31308                                  
 31309                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31310                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31311                                  
 31312                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31313                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31314                                  
 31315                                  MakeNode:
 31316                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31317 000050D7 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31318 000050DD 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31319 000050DE C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31320 000050E3 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31321 000050E6 E895F8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31322 000050E9 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31323                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31324                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31325 000050EB 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31326 000050EC 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31327 000050ED 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31328 000050EF 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31329 000050F1 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31330 000050F4 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31331                                  make_err_4:
 31332 000050F6 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31333                                  make_err_ret:
 31334                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31335                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31336 000050F8 98                      	cbw
 31337 000050F9 F9                      	STC
 31338                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31339 000050FA C3                      	retn
 31340                                  
 31341                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31342                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31343                                  make_type:
 31344                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31345                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31346                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31347 000050FB F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31348 00005100 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31349 00005102 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31350                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31351                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31352 00005107 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31353 0000510C 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31354 0000510E F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31355 0000510F B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31356                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31357                                  make_retn:
 31358                                  	;return
 31359 00005112 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31360                                  
 31361                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31362                                  
 31363                                  make_type2:
 31364 00005113 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31365 00005117 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31366 00005119 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31367 0000511A EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31368                                  
 31369                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31370                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31371                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31372                                  ;   else => file
 31373                                  
 31374                                  make_exists:
 31375 0000511C 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31376 0000511E B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31377                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31378 00005120 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31379 00005125 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31380                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31381                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31382 00005127 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31383 00005129 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31384 0000512B 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31385 0000512D 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31386 0000512F 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31387 00005130 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31388                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31389 00005134 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31390                                  	;test	ch,1

 31491 000051A3 58                      	POP	AX
 31492 000051A4 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31493                                  
 31494                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31495                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31496                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31497                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31498                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31499                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31500                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31501                                  ;
 31502                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31503                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31504                                  
 31505                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31506                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31507                                  
 31508                                  MakeEndShare:

 31534

 31551                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31552                                  ;
 31553                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31554                                  ;
 31555                                  ; Inputs:
 31556                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31557                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31558                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31559                                  ;		  entries
 31560                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31561                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31562                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31563                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31564                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31565                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31566                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31567                                  ;	  If FILE
 31568                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31569                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31570                                  ;	  If device
 31571                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31572                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31573                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31574                                  ; Function:
 31575                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31576                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31577                                  ; Outputs:
 31578                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31579                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31580                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31581                                  ;	  else
 31582                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31583                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31584                                  ;
 31585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31586                                  
 31587                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31588                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31589                                  
 31590                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31591                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31592                                  
 31593                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31594                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31595

 31738                                  ; DOOPEN
 31739                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31740                                  ;
 31741                                  ; Inputs:
 31742                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31743                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31744                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31745                                  ;	  If FILE
 31746                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31747                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31748                                  ;	  If device
 31749                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31750                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31751                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31752                                  ; Function:
 31753                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31754                                  ; Outputs:
 31755                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31756                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31757                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31758                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31759                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31760                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31761                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 31762                                  ;	  If device
 31763                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31764                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31765                                  ;	  If file
 31766                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31767                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31768                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31769                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31770                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31771                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31772                                  ;
 31773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31774                                  
 31775                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31776                                  	; DOSCODE:96C3h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31777                                  
 31778                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8AE4h)
 31779                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8C4Ch)
 31780                                  
 31781                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 31782                                  DOOPEN:
 31783                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 31784                                  
 31785 0000527F 88E6                    	MOV	DH,AH	  	; AH to different place

 32040                                  ;
 32041                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32042                                  ;
 32043                                  ; Inputs:
 32044                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32045                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32046                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32047                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32048                                  ; Function:
 32049                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32050                                  ; Outputs:
 32051                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32052                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32053                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32054                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32055                                  
 32056                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32150                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32151                                  ;
 32152                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32153                                  ;
 32154                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32155                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32156                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32157                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32158                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32159                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32160                                  ;
 32161                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32162                                  
 32163                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32164                                  	PUSH	AX
 32165                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32166                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32167                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32168                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32169                                  	push	es
 32170                                  	push	di
 32171                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32172                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32173                                  	pop	di
 32174                                  	pop	es
 32175                                  
 32176                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32177                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32178                                  	POP	AX
 32179                                  	retn
 32180                                  
 32181                                  %endif

 32218                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32219                                  ;
 32220                                  ; Inputs:

 32223                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT

 32435                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32436                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32437                                  ;
 32438                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32439                                  ;
 32440                                  ; Inputs:
 32441                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32442                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32443                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32444                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32445                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32446                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32447                                  ; Function:
 32448                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32449                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32450                                  ; Outputs:
 32451                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32452                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32453                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32454                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32455                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32456                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32457                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32458                                  
 32459                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32460                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32461                                  
 32462                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32463                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32464                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32465                                  
 32466                                  BUFSEC:
 32467                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32468                                  	;;;
 32469                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32470 00005445 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32471                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32472 00005449 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32473 0000544D 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32474                                  	;;;
 32475 0000544E 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32476 00005452 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32477                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32478 00005456 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32479 0000545B E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32480 0000545E E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32481                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32482                                  	;;;
 32483 00005461 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32484                                  	;;;
 32485 00005465 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32486                                  
 32487 00005467 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32488 0000546C 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32489 00005470 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32490 00005472 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32491 00005476 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32492 00005478 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32493 0000547C C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32494                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32495 00005480 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32496                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32497                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32498                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32499 00005485 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32500 00005488 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32501 0000548C F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32502 0000548D C3                              retn
 32503                                  
 32504                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32505                                  
 32506                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32509                                  ;
 32510                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32511                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32512                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32513                                  ;
 32514                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32515                                  ;
 32516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32517                                  
 32518                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32519                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32520                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32521                                  BUFRD:
 32522 0000548E 06                              PUSH	ES
 32523 0000548F 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 32524 00005491 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 32525 00005494 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 32526                                  
 32527                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 32528 00005496 07                              POP	ES
 32529 00005497 EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 32530                                  
 32531                                  BUF_OK:
 32532 00005499 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 32533 0000549B 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 32534 0000549F 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 32535 000054A1 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 32536 000054A3 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 32537                                  ;M039
 32538                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32539                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 32540                                  	;MOVSB
 32541                                  ;EVENRD:
 32542                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 32543                                  
 32544                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 32545                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 32546                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 32547                                  
 32548                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32549 000054A5 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 32550                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 32551                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 32552                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32553 000054A7 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 32554 000054A9 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 32555                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32556                                  	;adc	cx,0
 32557                                  	;rep	movsb
 32558                                  ;M039
 32559                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 32560 000054AA 07                              POP	ES
 32561                                  ;hkn; SS override
 32562 000054AB 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 32563                                  	;;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 32564                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32565                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024
 32566 000054B0 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 32567 000054B3 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 32568 000054B5 E86A10                          call	PLACEBUF
 32569                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 32570 000054B8 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 32571 000054BC 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 32572                                  ;M039
 32573                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32574                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 32575                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 32576                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 32577 000054BE 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 32578                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 32579                                  
 32580                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 32581 000054C3 F8                              CLC
 32582                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 32583 000054C4 16                      	push	ss
 32584 000054C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 32585                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 32586 000054C6 C3                              retn

 32780                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32781                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32782                                  ;
 32783                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32784                                  ;
 32785                                  ; Inputs:
 32786                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32787                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32788                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32789                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32790                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32791                                  ; Outputs:
 32792                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 32793                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 32794                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32795                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 32796                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32797                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 32798                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32799                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated
 32800                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32801                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32802                                  ;
 32803                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32804                                  
 32805                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32806                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32807                                  
 32808                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32809 00005569 52                      	PUSH	DX
 32810                                  	; 27/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32811                                  	;;;
 32812 0000556A FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32813                                  	;;;
 32814 0000556E 53                      	PUSH	BX
 32815                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 32816 0000556F 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 32817 00005573 FEC0                    	INC	AL		; Number of sectors per cluster
 32818 00005575 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL
 32819 00005577 28D0                    	SUB	AL,DL		; AL = Num of sectors left in first cluster
 32820 00005579 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 32821                                  	;MOV	CX,0
